Summary: Silver boomerang shaped one bright light a the point of bomerang light dies down and object shor though the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside cooking on the grill and i finished up around eleven it felt so good i decided to eat outside so i was setting outside my house a��� about eleven thirty i noticed a very very bright light too bright to be a star and to large to be a star so I thought must just be a helicopter but it was too low for it not to be herd I'm meen this thing was only about 500 foot of the ground then the craziest thing happens the light goes out and a dimmer green light turned on and this thing zipped across the sky it was extremely fast faster than anything I have ever seen I was baffeled I stood there like a statue for at least a half hour I was confused and terrified
